CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL( Brand__c , '2'), ISPICKVAL(Channel__c, 'CalvinKlein.us')), "866-513-0513",
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL( Brand__c , '2'), ISPICKVAL(Channel__c, 'CalvinKlein.ca')), "800-376-0528",
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL( Brand__c , '2'), ISPICKVAL(Channel__c, 'Calvin Klein Retail')), "866-214-6694",
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL( Brand__c , '1'), ISPICKVAL(Channel__c, 'Tommy.com')), "888-866-6948",
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL( Brand__c , '1'), ISPICKVAL(Channel__c, 'Tommy Hilfiger Retail')), "800-866-6922",
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL( Brand__c , '5'), ISPICKVAL(Channel__c, 'VanHeusen.com')), "866-378-9545",
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL( Brand__c , '5'), ISPICKVAL(Channel__c, 'Van Heusen Retail')), "800-388-9122",
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL( Brand__c , '83'), OR(ISPICKVAL(Channel__c, 'Van Heusen Retail'),ISPICKVAL(Channel__c, 'Warner.com'))), "866-378-9545",
IF( AND( OR(ISPICKVAL( Brand__c , '4'), ISPICKVAL( Brand__c , '81')), ISPICKVAL(Channel__c, 'Izod.com')), "866-378-9545",
IF( ISPICKVAL( Brand__c , '7'), "888-477-3336",
IF( OR(ISPICKVAL( Brand__c , '8'),ISPICKVAL( Brand__c , '9')), "866-378-9545",
IF( AND( OR(ISPICKVAL( Brand__c , '83'), ISPICKVAL( Brand__c , '10')), ISPICKVAL(Channel__c, 'Other Retailer')), "800-423-4313",
IF( AND( OR(ISPICKVAL( Brand__c , '4'), ISPICKVAL( Brand__c , '5'), ISPICKVAL( Brand__c , '1'), ISPICKVAL( Brand__c , '2'), ISPICKVAL( Brand__c , '81')), ISPICKVAL(Channel__c, 'Other Retailer')), "800-770-6858",
""
)))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Support Phone Number
